headline: Barclays Keeps Equal Weight Rating on Equinix (EQIX), Raises PT
summary: On May 27, Barclays raised the firm’s price target on Equinix, Inc. (NASDAQ:EQIX) to $837 from $834 and kept an Equal Weight rating. The rating update followed the firm’s model updates in the data center group, indicating a cautious yet stable outlook on Equinix, Inc.’s (NASDAQ: EQIX) operations. Equinix, Inc.’s (NASDAQ:EQIX) fiscal Q1 2025 earnings […]
